taskDescription: Assume that the three terpenoids in Problem 27-27 are derived biosynthetically from isopentenyl diphosphate and dimethylallyl diphosphate, each of which was isotopically labeled at the diphosphate-bearing carbon atom (C1). At what positions would the terpenoids be isotopically labeled?
